answers.author: William Shanahan
answers.text:
Hi Cheryl:
We are working on one.  I hope it will be finished towards the end of July and we can start in August.  This program is for current leaders, starting with our Department Heads.

Hi Cheryl, 
Here is a previously asked question that addresses leadership development and succession planning that I believe you will find useful. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21584
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Cheryl Hughes
text: Has your organization developed a leadership program as part of succession planning? We are in the early stages of developing a program for our city and could use some examples.
title: Sample Leadership Development Programs
